title: Why can't other people see my Highlights?!?!
body: Well I think other people should be able to see your own highlights for like a showoff , like you did something amazing. Wanted to show my friends a good play that I made but couldn't because they cant see my highlight. Please make a slide where people can see your highlights. Thank you

replies.body: Making highlights for myself is stupid. I wonder what's the point of having this feature and honor if friends can't see it

You can actually share those highlights with friends as you see fit! If you click on the folder icon in the highlight page, it should open up the location of where your highlights are saved so that you can share them.
Not in-client though, what if those friends are just League-only? Boo.

Wouldnt it make more sense to just have a tab in the options where you can select either "visible to no one", "visible to just friends" and "visible to everyone"? I would love to see this feature added into the game. The file system isnt that complicated but it is more complicated than it needs to be.
